Detailed Description

Class providees routine for database manipulation.

apply_add_limitations (  ) 

Function applyes data limitations.

Returns:
Объект доступа к базе данных.
Author:
Додонов А.А.

Definition at line 180 of file database.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $PageComposer = get_package( 'page::page_composer' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                        $Settings = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                        $Config = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( 
                              dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cf_add_limitations' , 'cleaned'
                        );
                        
                        if( $Config != '' )
                        {
                              $Config = explode( "\n" , $Config );
                              
                              foreach( $Config as $k => $ConfigLine )
                              {
                                    $Settings->load_settings( $ConfigLine );
                                    $PackageName = $Settings->get_setting( 'package_name' );
                                    $PackageVersion = $Settings->get_setting( 'package_version' , 'last' );
                                    $AddLimitation = $Settings->get_setting( 'data_limitation' , 'last' );
                                    $AddLimitation = $PageComposer->process_string( $Settings , $AddLimitation , $c = false );
                                    $Package = get_package( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , __FILE__ );
                                    $Package->set_add_limitations( $AddLimitation );
                              }
                        }
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

Definition at line 472 of file database.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $DBO = $this->get_object();
                        
                        $Result = $DBO->fetch_results( $Result );
                        
                        if( $this->DatabaseEncoding != 'UTF-8' )
                        {
                              $Result = $this->String->iconv( $this->DatabaseEncoding , 'UTF-8' , $Result );
                        }
                  
                        return( $Result );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )

get_list_of_tables (  ) 

Function returns a list of tables.

Returns:
A list of tables.
Exceptions:
Exception - An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 963 of file database.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $this->query_as( DB_ARRAY );
                        $Result = $this->query( 'SHOW TABLES' );
                        $ListOfTables = $this->fetch_results( $Result );
                        
                        foreach( $ListOfTables as $i => $TableInfo )
                        {
                              $ListOfTables[ $i ] = $TableInfo[ 0 ];
                        }
                        
                        return( $ListOfTables );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

get_object (  ) 

Function executes query.

Returns:
Data access object.
Author:
Додонов А.А.

Definition at line 226 of file database.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( $this->DatabaseAccessObject === false )
                        {
                              $Config = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( 
                                    dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cf_database_settings'
                              );
                              $Config = explode( '#' , $Config );
                              $this->DatabaseAccessObject = get_package( $Config[ 0 ] , $Config[ 1 ] , __FILE__ );
                              
                              /* the function get_object is always called before the query execution
                              that's why we don't need delayed connection and may connect to the database instantly */
                              $this->DatabaseAccessObject->get_connection();
                              $this->DatabaseEncoding = $Config[ 2 ];
                              $this->DBLogging = intval( @$Config[ 3 ] ) === 1 ? true : false;
                              $this->TablenamePrefix = $this->DatabaseAccessObject->TablenamePrefix;
                              $this->UserAlgorithms = get_package( 'user::user_algorithms' );
                              self::$Session = microtime( true );
                              
                              $this->apply_add_limitations();
                        }
                        
                        return( $this->DatabaseAccessObject );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

log_query ( $  Query,
$  Start 
)

Function logs query.

Parameters:
$Query - Query string.
$Start - Query execution start time.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 295 of file database.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $End = microtime( true );
                        if( $this->DBLogging )
                        {
                              $Owner = $this->UserAlgorithms->get_login();
                              $DBO->query( 
                                    "INSERT INTO umx_action ".
                                          "( alias , description , owner , ip , action_date, execute_time , session ) VALUES ( '".
                                          htmlspecialchars( self::$QueryName , ENT_QUOTES )."' , '".
                                          htmlspecialchars( $Query , ENT_QUOTES )."' , '$Owner' , '".$_SERVER[ 'REMOTE_ADDR' ].
                                          "' , NOW() , '".( $End - $Start )."' , '".self::$Session."' )" 
                              );
                              $DBO->query( 'COMMIT' );
                        }
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

query ( $  Query  ) 

Function executes query.

Parameters:
$Query - Query string.
Returns:
Query result.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 337 of file database.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Start = microtime( true );
                        $this->QueryCounter++;
                        $DBO = $this->get_object();
                        $Query = str_replace( array( '[eq]' ) , array( '=' ) , $Query );
                        
                        if( $this->DatabaseEncoding != 'UTF-8' )
                        {
                              $Result = $this->String->iconv( 
                                    $this->DatabaseEncoding , 'UTF-8' , $DBO->query( $this->String->compile_ultimix_tags( $Query ) )
                              );
                        }
                        else
                        {
                              $Result = $DBO->query( $this->String->compile_ultimix_tags( $Query ) );
                        }
                        
                        $this->log_query( $Query , $Start );
                        
                        return( $Result );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

            {

                  {
                        $this->QueryCounter++;

                        $Result = $DBO->select( $What , $Tables , $Condition );
